entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 2:00 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 74 %
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: NW 25 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h then light late this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
